li.label: Exclude the word 'wasteland' from the names generated for deserts?
li.tooltip: This word is heavily used to generate names for, well, wastelands from the ReGrowth: Wastelands mod.

li.label: Exclude the word 'steamy' from the names generated for tropical rainforests?
li.tooltip: This word is used to generate names for Boiling Forests from the ReGrowth: Boiling mod.

li.label: Exclude the word 'prairie' from the names generated for tundras?
li.tooltip: This word is used to generate names for Grasslands from the ReGrowth: Core mod. Besides, it doesn't fit very well with tundras.

li.text: Any changes require a restart to take effect
(changes will not apply to already generated worlds)
